segments.text: My parents called . As usual , they reminded me again that I should have a plan to marry by my late 20s.Easier set than done . Who should I marry ? I have no time to go on a date .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is not your mother finding one for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will find one myself , of course . I ’ m a modern girl .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps you can try the three minutes date , the latest type .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean dozens of the opposite sex meet each other for three minutes in a dimly bar serving alcohol , I hate that idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , there is an updated version , three minutes video date . I know an online dating website providing such service with a microphone and webcam , you can sigh for it . You can be face-to-face with a guy talking for maximum three minutes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t think it makes sense . Three minutes is such a short time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you can find out if there is a possibility of romance within the first second of meeting someone , so-called love at first sight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Anyway , I don ’ t want to post my face up for sale on the internet like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t worry . There are many other options using the internet as dating methods . Some sites operate at international standard even have got certifications .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , for these sites , you have to pay a membership fee . But all in all , it is more serious and professional . The chance of meeting a good and serious person who does not play games is higher .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t want to post my personal information on the internet . I ’ m not knowing who is reading it .
segments.speaker: S1
